TopicTitle: Research Probe Drops on the Mun and Minmus

Articles.Content:
I decided to build some research probes. Instead of a sky-crane delivery, I opted for a kerbal courier/research assistant/grad student.

Research Can 001 on approach to the Mun.

Jeb snagged a photo on Minmus.

Heading back home for burgers.

Well, maybe fish-burgers?

I like this delivery platform. I need more science gizmos to attach to the probes.
That's an awesome little one manner, I really like the look of it.
